languages.text:
Броня — это параметр персонажа или объекта, который снижает получаемые им повреждения на определенный процент.
Параметр брони всегда выражается в процентах. Если персонажу со значением броня 30% нанесут 9 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, он получит только 6 урона, а если ему нанесут 300 урона, то он получит только 210 урона.
Если же 300 урона нанесут персонажу с показателем брони 90%, то этот персонаж получит только 30 урона.

Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.
languages.original_text:
Броня — это параметр персонажа или объекта, который снижает получаемые им повреждения на определенный процент.
Параметр брони всегда выражается в процентах. Если персонажу со значением броня 30% нанесут 9 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, он получит только 6 урона, а если ему нанесут 300 урона, то он получит только 210 урона.
Если же 300 урона нанесут персонажу с показателем брони 90%, то этот персонаж получит только 30 урона.

traits.locale_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming damage by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.

languages.text:
Rüstung ist ein Parameter eines Charakters oder eines Objekts, der den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um einen bestimmten Prozentsatz reduziert.
Rüstung wird immer in Prozent angegeben. Wenn ein Charakter mit 30 % Rüstung 9 Schaden erleiden würde, erleidet er stattdessen nur 6 Schaden, und würde er 300 Schaden erleiden, erleidet er nur 210.
Wenn einem Charakter mit 90 % Rüstung 300 Schaden zugefügt wird, erleidet er nur 30 Schaden.
languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} ist ein Parameter eines Charakters oder eines Objekts, der den erlittenen Schaden um einen bestimmten Prozentsatz reduziert.
Rüstung wird immer in Prozent angegeben. Wenn ein Charakter mit 30 % Rüstung 9 Schaden erleiden würde, erleidet er stattdessen nur 6 Schaden, und würde er 300 Schaden erleiden, erleidet er nur 210.
Wenn einem Charakter mit 90 % Rüstung 300 Schaden zugefügt wird, erleidet er nur 30 Schaden.

languages.text:
L'armure est un paramètre qu'un personnage ou un objet peut posséder et qui réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis d'un certain pourcentage.
L'armure est toujours exprimée en pourcentage. Si un personnage doté d'une armure de 30 % subit 9 points de dégâts, il n'en subit en fait que 6, et s'il en subit 300, il n'en subit en fait que 210.
Si un personnage doté d'une armure de 90 % subit 300 points de dégâts, il n'en subit au final que 30.
languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

traits.locale_text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} est un paramètre qu'un personnage ou un objet peut posséder et qui réduit les dégâts subis d'un certain pourcentage.
L'armure est toujours exprimée en pourcentage. Si un personnage doté d'une armure de 30 % subit 9 points de dégâts, il n'en subit en fait que 6, et s'il en subit 300, il n'en subit en fait que 210.
Si un personnage doté d'une armure de 90 % subit 300 points de dégâts, il n'en subit en fait que 30.

languages.text:
护甲代表角色或物件按照百分比减伤的属性。
护甲始终以百分比来表示。如果某名角色拥有30%护甲，当该角色承受9点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，最终受到的伤害只有6点。当该角色承受300点伤害时，最终受到的伤害只有210点。
如果某名角色拥有90%护甲，当该角色承受300点伤害时，最终受到的伤害只有30点。
languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}代表角色或物件按照百分比减伤的属性。
护甲始终以百分比来表示。如果某名角色拥有30%护甲，当该角色承受9点伤害时，最终受到的伤害只有6点。当该角色承受300点伤害时，最终受到的伤害只有210点。
如果某名角色拥有90%护甲，当该角色承受300点伤害时，最终受到的伤害只有30点。

languages.text:
La armadura es un parámetro de un personaje u objeto que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido en un porcentaje concreto.
La armadura siempre se expresa en porcentajes. Si un personaje con 30 % de armadura recibe 9 puntos de daño, únicamente sufrirá 6. En caso de que recibiera 300, en realidad solo sufrirá 210.
Si se infligiera 300 puntos de daño a un personaje con 90 % de armadura, este solo sufriría 30 de daño.
languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} es un parámetro de un personaje u objeto que reduce el daño recibido en un porcentaje concreto.
La armadura siempre se expresa en porcentajes. Si un personaje con 30 % de armadura recibe 9 puntos de daño, únicamente sufrirá 6. En caso de que recibiera 300, en realidad solo sufrirá 210.
Si se infligiera 300 puntos de daño a un personaje con 90 % de armadura, este solo sufriría 30 de daño.

languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter of a character or object that reduces the damage it takes by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with an armour value of 30% takes 9 damage, he will only take 6 damage, and if he takes 300 damage, he will only take 200 damage.
If 300 damage is dealt to a character with 90% armour, that character will only take 30 damage.

languages.text:
アーマーはキャラクターやオブジェクトが持つことのできるパラメータであり、入ってくる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を特定のパーセンテージで軽減できる。
アーマーは常にパーセンテージで表される。30％のアーマーを所持しているキャラクターが9のダメージを受けた場合は、6のダメージが入ることになる。もしダメージが300の場合は210のダメージが入る。
アーマー値が90％のキャラクターに対するダメージが300の場合、キャラクターが負うダメージは30となる。
languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}はキャラクターやオブジェクトに備わっているパラメータ。付与されるダメージを特定のパーセンテージで軽減できる。
アーマーは常にパーセンテージで表される。30％のアーマーを所持しているキャラクターがダメージを9受けた場合、付与されるダメージは6となる。ダメージが300の場合、付与ダメージは210となる。
アーマー値が90％のキャラクターに対するダメージが300の場合、キャラクターが負うダメージは30となる。

languages.text:
Zırh; bir karakter veya nesnenin sahip olduğu, gelen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} belirli bir yüzde oranında azaltan bir parametredir.
Zırh her zaman yüzde olarak ifade edilir. %30 zırha sahip bir karakter; 9 puan hasar verebilen bir saldırıya uğrarsa yalnızca 6 puan hasara, 300 puan hasar verebilen bir saldırıya uğrarsa da yalnızca 210 puan hasara maruz kalır.
300 puan hasar verebilen bir saldırı %90 zırha sahip bir karaktere yapılırsa karakter yalnızca 30 puan hasara maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
Armour is a parameter a character or an object can have that reduces incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by a certain percentage.
Armour is always expressed as a percentage. If a character with 30% armour would suffer 9 damage, they instead only suffer 6, and if they would suffer 300, they would only suffer 210.
If 300 damage would be dealt to a character with 90% armour, the character only suffers 30 damage.
